tasks.label: Build: tfidf_serial
tasks.command: "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && if not exist build mkdir build && if not exist bin mkdir bin && cl /nologo /TC /std:c17 /O2 src\tfidf_serial.c /Fo:build\ /Fe:bin\tf_idf_serial.exe

tasks.label: Build: tfidf_mpi
tasks.command: "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && if not exist build mkdir build && if not exist bin mkdir bin && cl /nologo /TC /std:c17 /O2 src\tfidf_mpi.c /Fo:build\ /Fe:bin\tfidf_mpi.exe /I "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft SDKs\MPI\Include" /link /LIBPATH:"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft SDKs\MPI\Lib\x64" msmpi.lib

tasks.label: Clean
